tool_description: An Unnoficial Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List API. (Updates in Real-Time!)
name: Realtime Billionaires List
title: Realtime Billionaires List

api_list.name: [Optional]  Get All Billionaires List
api_list.description: This Optional endpoint will  also return back  all the Billionaires  based on their **Rankings in Real-Time.**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com/rich"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com/rich"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Billionaire By Rank [using query]
api_list.description:
This Endpoint will return back the billionaire on that  Specific Rank
**Note :** *The Rank Starts from*** 1**.
**The Endpoint Example :** /rich/rank=1

api_list.name: Get Billionaires within specific Range
api_list.description:
This will return the Billionaires Data within the provided range.

**Note** : *The Range starts from* **1**
**Example:**  rich?start=1&end=10

api_list.name: Get Billionaire By Rank.
api_list.description:
This Endpoint will return back the billionaire on that  Specific Rank
**Note :** *The Rank Starts from*** 1**.
**The Endpoint Example :** /rich/1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com/rich/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com/rich/{rank}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get only required number of Billionaires Data.
api_list.description:
This endpoint will get you the Billionaires Data  within the limit

**Note**: *The Limit Starts from* 1.
**Endpoint Example** : /rich?limit=10

api_list.name: Get All Billionaires List
api_list.description: This endpoint will **return back all the Billionaires** based on their **Rankings in Real-Time.**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com/billionaires"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtime-billionaires-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
